description: A furniture ecommerce site that focuses on simple design, making it easy for users to find the products they need.
A Challenge from Frontend Mentor, which involved integrating with the shrtcode URL shortening API and crafting CSS styles to match their design.

During my time in university, I created a small project involving the design and development of a CRUD API for managing watch-related data. This project incorporated user authentication to ensure secure access to the system.

W.A.R.P is a platformer game inspired by Cuphead. Play as a character who gets kidnapped to a castle by the insects he previously killed and embarks on a mission to safely return home. Our group of five collaboratively worked on this project, with me taking charge of the coding aspect.
Jumpy Box is a platformer game inspired by Super Meat Boy, where the objective is to rescue the princess as quickly as possible.
